name: @fossalyze/privacy-friendly-iframe
description: Delay rendering an iframe until consent has been provided.

scripts.build: npm run pre-build && npm run dist:lib && npm run dist:prod
scripts.dist:prod: rm -rf ./dist/prod && mkdir -p ./dist/prod && terser ./build/pf-iframe.js --output ./dist/prod/pf-iframe.min.js && terser ./build/replace-all-dynamic-iframe.js --output ./dist/prod/replace-all-dynamic-iframe.min.js && terser ./build/replace-all-static-iframe.js --output ./dist/prod/replace-all-static-iframe.min.js && cleancss -o ./dist/prod/pf-iframe.min.css ./build/pf-iframe.css

author: Timothy Gillespie (FOSSalyze GmbH)
